Game information:  

Defense Grid 2 - a new word game in the style of "tower defense". You are waiting
for innovations that require a permanent change of tactics, because content and
gameplay are also changing constantly. There are many ways to pass the level, so
the choice of strategy depends on you. In addition, cooperative and multiplayer
modes give you even more pleasure from the game. You will find a fascinating and
fun mix of strategy and puzzle.
